website_summaries.verdict: Party-time tub for a bucket o’ beers (or water for a kids' gathering).
pros: Simple design suitable for any occasion

website_summaries.verdict: A large, vintage beverage tub that holds up well to extended use.
pros: Sturdy, watertight galvanized tub that can be used indoors and out
Large enough to hold 8 bottles of wine
cons: A few users have complained of scratches and dents

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for a small gathering and worked well. Much classier than a cooler and easy enough for people to grab beverages from. Depending on how much ice you add, you can probably fit 12-18 pack in each. Also, ice didn't melt right away and maintained everything cold. Feel sturdy and durable. These can also be multi-use - we used for picking fruit from our trees.
customer_reviews.author: Rza1

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great super cute (even though the guys set up the table wrong 😂)
customer_reviews.author: Shirly Himmelhaver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer must have
customer_reviews.text: If you like having backyard BBQ and parties, this i must say needs to be in your house :) I was able to fit 2 huge bottles of Moscato, 10 kiddie size bottled water and 12 cans of pop plus ice. it kept all my drinks cold and there was no leaking when the ice melted. It does sweat a bit, I have to put a kitchen towel underneath to make sure our countertop doesnt flood with water lol! I would recommend and I am thinking of buying this again to gift to my brother in law this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tineejonah

customer_reviews.title: loved!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a photo shoot with my six month old and it held him and the water and looked super cute
customer_reviews.author: Daelyn

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! As expected
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! As expected. I've only used once and never leaked. Had a little condensation, but after 4 hours with ice in it. Just put a towel underneath so my counters wouldn't get ruined. Served it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer parties
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bucket for 3 parties--it's great for a picnic, the beach, or a rooftop. It's sturdy and will last forever, and it's just the right size to toss in 8 bottles of champagne or a picnic lunch for 6 and a couple of bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie M. Schlittenhart

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a mimosa bar at a bridal shower, worked well!
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: It’s more beautiful than the photo.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the style,size and the patina. We had vinyl decals made with a monogram and theme for a baby shower. The colors used were teal and dark lavender. The mom to be said it was to be the baby’s first toy box!
customer_reviews.author: Sara H. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance
customer_reviews.text: I read some negative reviews of this leaking but I decided to give it a chance and I’ll be honest I wasn’t expecting it to be great but it was it literally kept the ice from melting all night long and come morning it still had some ice in it overall I was satisfied because it kept the drinks cold and it also has a tray on the bottom to catch any leakage it might and it also came with a stand have but I haven’t had a problem with it yet
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for many of the parties we have at home to hold all kinds of drinks. This product was bigger than I expected and pretty good quality. I was afraid that it would leak through the bottom, but it has held up well. Can hold a couple of cases of beer (yes, it's THAT big). Great for big parties and outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Anjila Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of beverages but LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Great size galvanized tub. Holds lots of sodas, water bottles or wine. I thought I had tested this tub for leakage. Well surprise surprise... the darn thing leaked big time! I had placed it on top of a thick towel and set it in my raised stone hearth. When my guests left I went to empty the tub and the towel was absolutely saturated! I will only use this outdoors. Never again will be used in the house
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Perfext
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing!! I searched multiple stores and could not find what I was looking for. Was a Little hesitant to purchase online without seeing it but could not be happier! perfect size, great quality, used it for make a gin punch in with no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my baby’s fifth month photos. And she fit perfectly in there! Absolutely love it. And now I can keep it in store for any event.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana C.

customer_reviews.title: Ice/Beverage holder
customer_reviews.text: Used it for ice and beverage at daughter's wedding shower was perfect
customer_reviews.author: linda kafkas

customer_reviews.title: Using it as a pond, looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I made this into a pond in a pot, it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: GeneralName

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable structure
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality of this cooler container. Super sturdy! Ice lasted quite well.
customer_reviews.author: syd

customer_reviews.title: Has many uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my retractable hose, as all of the plastic buckets I used in the past crack easily. So far I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Ambrosino

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice / Drink Tub. . . NO Stand To Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. I searched high and low, on Amazon and off for a metal stand to fit it, but there is none to be had! Very disappointing for me, but not a prob to him. He wanted the bucket design and is fine with putting it on a towel on a bar stool or other table. He's very happy! Metal scoops for ice are also helpful and a metal Mallot instead of ice pick is also useful.
customer_reviews.author: sandpebble

customer_reviews.title: Good size bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Its a good size ice bucket to hold enough drinks for a decent size home party! I am happy with my purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a party. It worked great. Held lots of beer and water for several hours without leaking. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is a great size for many things. I use it to hold firewood in my house. Holds approximately a dozen split pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: No deceptive product photos or bad English on this one. It's exactly as described and ships really fast. Nice ice bucket for either everyday use or you can easily set it up on a fancy table and it holds it's own. I am probably getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Km

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Classic
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had it full of ice and water bottles for about 8 hours and it didn't leak a bit! It was larger enough to hold about 18 water bottles and ice. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use at a party. It was just what I needed. Great size, doesn’t leak, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D

customer_reviews.title: they loved it! Perfect size and nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift and filled it with camping/picnic supplies... they loved it! Perfect size and nice and sturdy. I'd planned on painting their name on the side too bug totally spaced it out.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very well made!! Doesn't leak very looks very pro. Holds a lot of ice and beer !!!!!! Love ❤️ it
customer_reviews.author: Msbehaven69

customer_reviews.title: Sweats.
customer_reviews.text: Water sweats more than I like to only have used twice.
customer_reviews.author: shelbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has a wonderful vintage look and was perfect for holding ice and drinks. It did not leak. Love the handles on the sides for easy handling.
customer_reviews.author: wishwatanabe

customer_reviews.title: but it appeared like someone else used it for awhile and then returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Showed up looking used. Perhaps that is part of the character. It didn’t bother me because I intended to use it for outdoors, but it appeared like someone else used it for awhile and then returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for baby shower beverages - no leaking and held about 15-20 cans and water bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! It is the same as my PB ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! It is the same as my PB tin but less then half the price. I only used it once and didn't notice rust or leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel H

customer_reviews.title: but it is as advertised and nice..
customer_reviews.text: not sure why my wife wanted this, but it is as advertised and nice . . .
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cayford

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product but its smaller than the pictures display. Would recommend. Just looks smaller than 6 gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I used this to put the juice in for kids for my Easter Party.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Great drink bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great drink bucket. Used it at our BBQ and it hods many drinks, soda, water, beer and more. Plenty of place with lots of ice and best of all it doesn't leak. Great addition to our outdoor parties!!
customer_reviews.author: IMA10

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great looking, & watertight!
customer_reviews.text: This tub was exactly what I wanted. It looks great. It's sturdy and watertight. It fit about 24 water bottles inside with ice under and in between the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s a well made product and I’m glad that I don’t have to worry about it rusting!! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: perfect understated beverage bin
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and packaged neatly. They were perfect for a party that I had in my backyard with about 50 people. Held ice, beer, wine...perfect!
customer_reviews.author: RVH

customer_reviews.title: Large size - great for Wine or Beer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to hold wine bottles. Others were more geared towards beer and this is shown with beer in the picture. However the depth is the perfect size to hold much larger wine bottles. Great for a party!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved it used it for a party to hold drink and ice it worked amazingly
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Paffhausen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for cook-out party. One for alcohol and one for non-alcohol drink. It was just perfect size and it looked good!!!! I am glad that I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Babharu

customer_reviews.title: Good Size
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for the size of gatherings we usually host. It can hold approximately sixteen bottles of beverage. It is simple looking which I like and the handles are really convenient. My only complaint was it came with a slight dent already in the side but most people wouldn't notice. It was not large enough to send back and hardly noticeable. I decided to keep it regardless. I like it. I know someone mentioned that their's leaked but we did not have this problem. We are pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have used it 3 times and I love it absolutely no leaking this tub is bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it 3 times and I love it absolutely no leaking this tub is bigger than I expected fits 18 bottles of beer with 20 lbs of ice in the tub. I Highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Roman

customer_reviews.title: but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a little bigger, but very nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Grabski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item came to me damaged. Not a new product. Not as depicted
customer_reviews.author: Tara Crossan

customer_reviews.title: elegant and useful
customer_reviews.text: This holds many bottles in real style and looks good inside or outside. With two of these you could serve a crowd.
customer_reviews.author: KDVH_FLA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was great! We got it for a party and looked really nice. No leaks after 8 hrs!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper than pottery barn and just as good looking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KReed

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and didn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's birthday party to put ice cream pails in. Worked great and didn't leak!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holds a lot and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a party. It came on time and fit the bill. I would buy more and recommmend it to anyone who is having a party where you want to have drinks on ice.
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Great beer tub
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves it for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome. I can see how it would fit drinks ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a planter for herbs inside/outside. It's awesome. I can see how it would fit drinks but it works so well as a planter. And it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Alli S.

customer_reviews.title: Good tub!
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size tub for drinks! Just as other reviewers have indicated! It is definitely more for outdoors as it has that hammered metal look.
customer_reviews.author: Krysten

customer_reviews.title: usefull
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted something like this, instead of a cooler. this tub comes in handy for summer parties, you can fit a lot and it looks good
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stylish Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bucket, Looks like an expensive Crate and Barrel version. So far have been pleased with quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Its great and rustic! It's not the super galvanized kind that retains a lot of the cold like the $60-$100 ones but its a great casual one!
customer_reviews.author: D&R

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for our party!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for serving beer, didn't leak and looks great! If you're looking for an affordable solution and don't want to spend a lot, this is perfect for any hostess.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots of ice and I have had no problems with it
customer_reviews.author: stefanie elliott

customer_reviews.title: Beer for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: I fit about 30 12-oz cans of beer with lots of ice in this bucket.
customer_reviews.author: TGurley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for. Used it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Used it as a cooler at a party for wine and it did not leak :)
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for coronas
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thought it was a perfect size and very attractive. I liked how many bottles it fit. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I used this item to keep beverages cold and it leaked. It leaked off of my counter top and onto my new wooden cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Candice C.

customer_reviews.title: Party Tub
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to display cold drinks. Keeps a case of drinks cold and nicely displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: item received does not look like the picture. it looks more like the behrens tub.
customer_reviews.author: alwazlafin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Kept the adult beverages cold at my housewarming. Fits quite a few bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Von Myart

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed this as a raffle gift, we filled it with beer from around the world, along with glasses and coasters
customer_reviews.author: Michele McNaughton

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Tubs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these tubs. They were exactly what I was looking for - perfect size and shape. They also arrived very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beverage Container
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a cool beverage holder for a while, and a lot of the ones I found locally that were simple galvanized buckets were priced unreasonably high, in my opinion. This one was perfect, arrived in excellent condition, and the price was fantastic! A great addition for summer parties and outdoor barbecues, and I expect it will last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmama

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bucket... Not too deep for beer, water, and soda bottles. Nice quality... Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VHReviews

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We got this to hold our beer and wound up not, instead we use to store firewood in one of our smaller fireplaces.
customer_reviews.author: JSuss

customer_reviews.title: Great for a garden planter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tub to make a gift for a friends retirement party. My friend loves cardinals and it matched acardinals garden piece I purchased. I Had my husband drill holes in the bottom. I love how it turned out and the guest of honor loved it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Oak Park RN

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Held about 8 bottles of wine....no leaking. Worked great. I actually bought three of them for my wedding for various drinks. They had ice in them for about 8 hours and never was there in leaking at any point. After the wedding I decided to use one as a dog bowl because I have three Great Danes and I needed to have something on our deck. I have been putting water in it for the last two months and there hasn't been any leaks, rusts, or breaks. I absolutely love it for the look and the durability. I still use the other two for hosting events because they really do look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: More product info
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed this for serving beverages. It holds 12-14 beer bottles in crushed ice, or about 16 kid's fruit juice bags. The metal is good quality and the bottom seam is caulked with clear silicone to prevent leaking. The handles are sturdy and very comfortable to hold. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, cute and super functional!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great quality. No leaks what so ever. I used it to hold bottles of champagne and ice. It was perfect! It held 5 bottles easy. It did sweat a little but that was expected. Just put a cute towel underneath. Would 100% buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Francis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little tub. Got it for a baby shower. Holds 20 bottles of water easily.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Would order again!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these tubs to contain iced drinks for my daughters open house. They worked perfectly - held a good amount of drinks, the last ice lasted all day, and no leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised (in the title) as a Beverage tub. The first and only time it was used the bucket leaked. There was water everywhere!! It did not serve it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great size, no leaks, not much else to say about this.
customer_reviews.author: sarmarie29407

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for backyard parties. It is large and excellent quality. Easily holds 6 bottles of wine with ice. I’ve used it multiple times and it has not leaked or rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Haeuser

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a party to hold bottles of beer. Looks so much nicer than having a regular ice cooler on the table. Easily held 14 beers or so and probably could have gotten a few more in if needed. Kept drinks cold and easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice. Great for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this beverage holder. Next time I use I will take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: I love this tub
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work to hold soda and water for meetings. It's fabulous! It holds a lot! Only complaint wold be that it "sweats". But that's to be expected. Lay down a towel. I love this tub!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and leak-free
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for parties. Ours hasn’t leaked or rusted. Nice size and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Christy F

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many galvanized buckets in the past. I purchased more than enough of these for the future. they are well sealed and look very nice! Even after 15 or more uses!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used them for a backyard event. They could hold enough ice and 3-4 bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McGinley

customer_reviews.title: Bought for different purpose
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as a container to hold fixings for S'Mores at a picnic wedding reception. Needed a container to display the packages of s'more fixings that we had as favors for the guests. The tub was a perfect size and we put bamboo roasting sticks for the guests (also ordered from Amazon) in a matching tall vase that I already had. The display was great and now my daughter will have the tub to use for beverages when she hosts an event at her home. It is a great size and should be fun to use later. I am sure I will be borrowing from her myself.
customer_reviews.author: knell

customer_reviews.title: I won't be using this for beer!
customer_reviews.text: I am planning on setting this on my front porch for overflow mail and UPS packages in order to keep everything in one place!
customer_reviews.author: kimberlee j. mcvey

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage container for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a baby shower! Held a lot of beverages and I added ice and NO leaks!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Binder

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful bucket it is the perfect size it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bucket it is the perfect size it would be great for any party or get together and it does hold water. However this wasn’t exactly what I was looking for so I switched it out for something else
customer_reviews.author: jackilee cruz

customer_reviews.title: Party
customer_reviews.text: It is a great size, but it leaked. We used it for an outdoor party and thank goodness we had it on our patio out doors, since it leaked. If I use it again for another party, I will most likely use a liner, but disappointed this is the case. I would not suggest you use this inside before you test it out. Really was excited to display but so sorry this happened.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Beverage Tub
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, used them to hold drinks at a party. Also will work to put decorations in other times of the year. Great price, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as described or just as an ice bucket. No leaking! Holds enough ice for a crowd of around 30-35 for about 4-5 hours easy.
customer_reviews.author: JWW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Great for using for beer
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great for using for beer, wine and other beverages for a party. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Fits lots of the smaller cans of soda and looks nice! Received quickly
customer_reviews.text: Having party this weekend and needed to put soda in something. This does the trick. Fits lots of the smaller cans of soda and looks nice! Received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Got it at an awesome price from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Got it at an awesome price from Amazon Warehouse Deals. Looks good to serve any chilled bottles or soda cans.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good quality bucket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bucket for use at a party and it fulfilled my needs perfectly. Good size and depth, good quality with solid handles (they don't move up or down).
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: His favorite thing was the tub
customer_reviews.text: bought this to put Christmas present in for my husband. His favorite thing was the tub, he puts beer on ice in it when we have company. no leaks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda May

customer_reviews.title: Drinkin time
customer_reviews.text: These are nice tubs. I haven't had ice in them but they will hold a twelve pack plus. I bought two for those afternoon summer barbecues

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came all scratched and has a manufacturer stamp on it that's visible! Not worth the price I paid!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tub. We use them for our office happy hours.

product_meta.title: Tablecraft Galvanized Oval Beverage Tub, 5.5 Gallons
product_meta.description: Size:5.5 Gallon| Style Name:GalvanizedKeep your drinks cool at your next barbeque or gathering with TableCraft's Galvanized Beverage Tub with Handles. Galvanized metal texture adds rustic charm to your setting. Large capacity holds plenty of drinks to serve your guests. Design features handles for easy carrying. Easy to clean, wipe with a damp cloth.
feature_bullets: Serve your guests' favorite drinks in style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars353 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
